bp_text.value: From client to courthouse, we have full order tracking transparency. The fundamentals of Abstracting hasn't changed much in a hundred years; however, technology changes daily. We are driving to merge the two and we work tirelessly to ensure our workflows adopt the latest in beneficial technological advancements.
bp_text.processed: From client to courthouse, we have full order tracking transparency. The fundamentals of Abstracting hasn't changed much in a hundred years; however, technology changes daily.
